subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Roger Federer beat Robin Soderling to advance to the semifinals against No. 3 Novak Djokovic, while top-seeded Rafael Nadal plays his quarterfinal Thursday.
snippet: Second-seeded Roger Federer beat Robin Soderling to advance to the semifinals against No. 3 Novak Djokovic, while top-seeded Rafael Nadal plays his quarterfinal Thursday.
